translation.en: Calling all trains!
♪ All aboard Let's make tracks ♪
♪ Mighty Express ♪
♪ Mighty strong and mighty fast ♪
♪ Mighty, Mighty Express ♪
♪ Put our crew to the test ♪ ♪ Mighty Express ♪
♪ It's Mighty time ♪
♪ All aboard, we're on our way ♪
♪ Mighty fast to save the day ♪
♪ Mega Mission to the max ♪ ♪ Let's make tracks ♪
♪ Mighty Express ♪
[narrator] A Mighty Christmas!
[Nico] Christmas is tonight! All we need is snow!
And there. Hmm.
Is it Christmas yet? Huh? Huh? Huh?
Almost, Flicker! Pretty soon the whole town will be here
translation.es: Ya casi, Flicker. Ya vendrán todos para la fiesta de Navidad.

translation.en: for the big Christmas party.
translation.es: Ya vendrán todos para la fiesta de Navidad.

translation.en: Then we'd better decorate faster!
Did someone say, "Fast, fast, faster?"
Oops! Sorry, Nico! I'm just so excited for Christmas!
translation.es: Lo siento, Nico. Estoy muy emocionado por la Navidad.

translation.en: Me, too!
Whoa! Looking Christmassy, Nico!
Nice job, everyone.
Now let's set up the spot for the Christmas tree.
Allow me to introduce myself.
I'm Mandy Mail, the best mail delivery train in town!
translation.es: Soy Mandy Mail, la mejor repartidora del pueblo.

translation.en: If you need anything delivered, I'm your train!
Mandy is the newest member of the Mighty Express. And this is her mail carrier pigeon friend, Flap!
translation.es: Mandy es una integrante nueva, y esa es su paloma mensajera, Flap.

translation.en: [all] Hiya! Welcome to the team!
-[comm alert] -Carrie to Max!
Hi, Carrie!
I need help with a delivery at Mail Station. Could you send a train?
translation.es: ¿Puedes enviar un tren a la estación Postal?

translation.en: I've got it! Super-special, extra-important delivery coming right up!
translation.es: ¡Yo me encargo! ¡Voy por ti, entrega superimportante!

translation.en: Dear Santa, for Christmas
I would love a special delivery of an orange-and-green soccer ball.
translation.es: me encantaría recibir un balón de fútbol naranja y verde.

translation.en: That would be first class.
Love, Carrie. Signed and sealed!
translation.es: ¡Eso sería de primera! Cariños, Carrie". Firmada y sellada.

translation.en: Now to deliver all of these letters to Santa at the North Pole.
translation.es: Solo falta entregar las cartas al Polo Norte.

translation.en: Hi! You must be Carrie!
You must be Mandy Mail. I'm so glad you're here!
translation.es: Y tú, Mandy Mail. Me alegra que vinieras.

translation.en: Well, I am the best.
So where's this super-special, extra-important delivery you've got for me?
translation.es: Y bien, ¿dónde está la entrega superimportante?

translation.en: Right here!
Mail?!
[scoffs] I mean, I've delivered mail before. That doesn't seem very important.
translation.es: Ya he entregado cartas antes. Eso no parece muy importante.

translation.en: Oh! Every letter is important, especially...
translation.es: Toda carta es importante, en especial…

translation.en: Uh-oh! Another delivery! Gotta go! Thanks, Mandy!
So much for something super special and extra important.
translation.es: Tendré que olvidarme de mi entrega superimportante.

translation.en: [gasps] The town Christmas tree!
Now that is an important delivery! Perfect for me!
translation.es: Esa sí es una entrega importante. ¡Perfecto!

translation.en: I mean, for us. Make way for Mandy Mail!
translation.es: Sí, para ambos. ¡Abran paso a Mandy Mail!

translation.en: Great decorating, everyone! OK, let's light this tree up.
Making the switch!
Wow! It's beautiful!
And I'm the one who delivered it!
And now it's almost time for the best part of Christmas!
translation.es: ¡Y ya falta poco para la mejor parte!

translation.en: Presents?
No. The big town party!
And then... Santa comes!
I sent a letter to Santa asking for a new bike.
Um, why does Diesel have my letter?
Uh, Mandy? Weren't you supposed to deliver these letters to Santa?
translation.es: ¿No debías entregarle las cartas a Santa?

translation.en: If Santa doesn't get our letters,
the kids in Tracksville won't get presents!
We have to get these letters to the North Pole right away!
Calling all trains! Please report to the Busy Board for today's Mega Mission!
translation.es: ¡Atención, trenes! ¡Vengan a la estación de Tareas para la megamisión!

translation.en: It's Mighty Time!
Today's Mega Mission goes to...
our newest team member, Mandy Mail!
What? Really?!
Everybody deserves a second chance.
Delivering mail is what you do best, Mandy.
translation.es: Eres la mejor con el correo.

translation.en: You'll go back and pick up the letters to Santa at Mail Station,
translation.es: Debes recoger las cartas en la estación Postal

translation.en: then deliver them to the North Pole as fast as you can!
translation.es: y llevarlas al Polo Norte lo antes posible.

translation.en: Mandy Mail never fails!
I guess delivering the letters to Santa is super special and extra important.
translation.es: Creo que entregar estas cartas sí es superimportante.

translation.en: Mandy, it's time to...
-Clean up! -Tune up!
-Hook up! -To the beat of my sweet track!
♪ It's time to clean up ♪ ♪ It's time to tune up ♪
translation.es: ¡Es hora de limpiar! ¡Es hora de ajustar!

translation.en: ♪ It's time to hook up ♪
It's wash time! Break it down!
♪ Rub-a-dub-dub Rub, rub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Rub-a-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ Rub-a-dub-dub Rub, rub-a-dub-dub ♪
♪ Rub-a-dub-dub-dub ♪
♪ It's time to clean up ♪
translation.es: ¡Es hora de limpiar! ¡Es hora de ajustar!

translation.en: -♪ It's time to tune up ♪ -It's tune-up time!
translation.es: ¡Es hora de limpiar! ¡Es hora de ajustar! ¡Es hora de ajustar!

translation.en: ♪ With Mighty Express ♪
Check! Check! Checkity-check-check!
And... you are Liza-certified!
And now it's time to hook up with the mail carrier car!
translation.es: ¡Es hora de enganchar el carrito del correo!

translation.en: All right, Mandy. Get the letters to Santa and save Christmas!
translation.es: Bien, Mandy. Entrega las cartas y salva la Navidad.

translation.en: I will save Christmas!
Now you're ready to...
[all] Make tracks!
Make way for Mandy Mail!
[grunts] I don't know if all these letters will fit!
I think you need another train to help you.
Help? No, no, no, no, no! I can save Christmas all on my own!
translation.es: ¿Ayuda? No. Puedo salvar la Navidad sola.

translation.en: But this is a lot of mail, Mandy. I don't want any letters falling out.
translation.es: Pero son muchas cartas, Mandy. No quiero que ninguna se caiga.

translation.en: Let me see if Max can send someone to help.
translation.es: Veré si Max puede enviar ayuda.

translation.en: Hi, Max! We need another train to help us cos there's a lot of mail here.
translation.es: Hola, Max. Necesitamos otro tren porque son muchas cartas.

translation.en: I'll send Freight Nate. He loves to haul big loads.
translation.es: A Freight Nate le encantan las cargas.

translation.en: And Nico will come too, in case there are any problems with the track.
translation.es: Nico también irá por si acaso.

translation.en: Come on... Close!
See? There! Don't need any help. Bye!
Mandy! Don't you want to wait for Nate and Nico?
We made it here fast, fast, faster!
But Mandy already left and she has too much mail to carry by herself!
translation.es: Mandy ya se fue. Lleva demasiadas cartas para ella sola.

translation.en: Oh, no! This is a Christmas calamity!
Let's catch up to Mandy and help!
Come in, Mandy. Nate and Nico are on their way to help!
translation.es: Mandy, Nate y Nico van en camino.

translation.en: No, no, no. I'm good. I can do it by myself!
translation.es: No, estoy bien. Puedo hacerlo sola.

translation.en: I'm going to be the one
to save the super-special, extra-important Christmas delivery.
Mandy Mail never fails!
Whew! It's getting chilly! I'd better go faster to warm us up.
translation.es: Hace frío. Iré más rápido para entibiarnos.

translation.en: [both] Mandy! Slow down!
I never thought I'd say this, but I need...
translation.es: Nunca creí que diría esto, pero… ¡necesito ayuda!

translation.en: -Help! -[Flap squawks]
Nate!
Don't worry, Mandy, we'll save you!
[Mandy] Hurry!
Mega grappling claw, activate!
Mega-stabiliser legs, activate!
Careful, Nate. According to my calculations, the ice we're on might...
translation.es: Cuidado, según mis cálculos, el hielo podría…

translation.en: break!
I've got this!
Thanks for helping me!
No problem! The Mighty Express is always ready to help!
That's what you call teamwork!
By the way, you dropped some letters.
Oh, no! I'm sorry. You know what?
translation.es: ¡Ay, no! Lo siento. ¿Sabes qué? Creo que sí necesito ayuda.

translation.en: I could use a little help with this delivery.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Creo que sí necesito ayuda.

translation.en: Happy to be of service!
Let's get these letters to Santa!
Chugga-chugga zoom!
Approaching North Pole Station!
Wow, look! Santa's Workshop!
Ho, ho, ho! Hello, Nico, Mandy, Flap and Nate!
translation.es: ¡Jo, jo, jo! Hola, Nico, Mandy, Flap y Nate.

translation.en: According to my calculations, it's Santa!
translation.es: Según mis cálculos, es Santa. ¡El verdadero Santa!

translation.en: The real Santa! And he knows our names!
translation.es: Según mis cálculos, es Santa. ¡El verdadero Santa! ¡Y nos conoce!

translation.en: We've got a special delivery for you, Santa.
Thanks to some help from Nate, done and delivered!
What's all this?
Letters from the kids in Tracksville telling you what they'd like for Christmas!
translation.es: Son las cartas de los niños de Pista Férrea.

translation.en: Hmm.
Is that a good "hmm" or a bad "hmm?"
translation.es: ¿Ese fue un buen o un mal "vaya"?

translation.en: Well, I'm afraid it's not good.
translation.es: Me temo que no es bueno.

translation.en: It's too late to make any more presents. It's time to make our deliveries!
translation.es: Ya es muy tarde. Es hora de las entregas.

translation.en: And there's a storm brewing!
We need to head out soon or we'll get caught in it!
translation.es: Debemos salir pronto o nos alcanzará.

translation.en: But we came all this way! And the kids worked so hard on their letters!
translation.es: Pero nos costó mucho, y los niños se esforzaron tanto.

translation.en: And now they won't get presents?
I ruined Christmas!
There, there. You didn't ruin Christmas, Mandy.
translation.es: Calma. No arruinaste la Navidad, Mandy.

translation.en: Christmas is about so much more than presents.
translation.es: La Navidad es mucho más que solo regalos.

translation.en: Yeah. Like getting together with your family and friends.
translation.es: También es compartir con tus seres queridos.

translation.en: Friends! That's it!
What if we got our friends to come and help make presents for the kids?
translation.es: ¿Y si les pedimos ayuda con los regalos?

translation.en: Well, we do have a little time.
With some help, we could make the toys we need.
Ha! Even Santa needs a little extra help sometimes. Ho, ho, ho!
translation.es: Hasta Santa necesita ayuda a veces. ¡Jo, jo, jo!

translation.en: OK, Mandy to Max. Come in, Max!
translation.es: Bien. Mandy a Max. Contesta, Max.

translation.en: There you are!
Are you all right?
Yup! We got to the North Pole, but we've got a lot of presents to make.
translation.es: Sí, llegamos al Polo Norte. Pero tenemos muchos regalos que hacer.

translation.en: According to my calculations, it's gonna take a really long time!
We need your help!
We're on our way with Brock, Milo and Flicker.
translation.es: Vamos con Brock, Milo y Flicker.

translation.en: Ho, ho, ho! This is where we make all the toys!
translation.es: ¡Jo, jo, jo! Aquí es donde hacemos los juguetes.

translation.en: This place is amazing!
Thanks! I designed it myself. Tinsel-tastic, isn't it?!
translation.es: Gracias. Lo diseñé yo misma. Es fantástico, ¿no?

translation.en: I hope help gets here soon!
-We made it! -Hi, Santa!
-Ho, ho, ho! Hello! -Thanks for coming.
Oh, my gosh, oh, my gosh, oh, my gosh! Santa! I'm a big fan!
It's good to see you, too, Milo! I'm so glad you're all here!
translation.es: También es bueno verte, Milo. Me alegra que estén aquí.

translation.en: We have to hurry if we want to finish the toys before the storm hits!
translation.es: Debemos apresurarnos para vencer a la tormenta.

translation.en: What's my job?
Mandy, you're in charge of wrapping the gifts. We brought your wrapping car.
translation.es: Envolverás los regalos. Trajimos tu carrito para envolver.

translation.en: Wrapping?! But what about making toys? I thought I'd get an important job.
translation.es: ¿Qué hay de los juguetes? Quiero hacer algo importante.

translation.en: You know, Mandy, when you're part of a team, every job is important.
translation.es: Cuando trabajas en equipo, todo trabajo es importante.

translation.en: All right, Santa. Then I'll be the best gift-wrapper who ever wrapped!
translation.es: Bien, Santa. Haré los mejores paquetes.

translation.en: I'll be a wrap star! [chuckles]
That's the spirit! Now let's ho, ho, go!
translation.es: Así se habla. Ahora empecemos antes de que llegue la tormenta.

translation.en: Before that storm gets here!
translation.es: Ahora empecemos antes de que llegue la tormenta.

translation.en: ♪ Happy holidays from Tracksville ♪
♪ Mighty Express Wishing you the best ♪
translation.es: ¡Felices fiestas desde Pista Férrea! ¡Mighty Express! Les deseamos lo mejor para estas fiestas.

translation.en: ♪ For the holidays this year ♪
translation.es: Les deseamos lo mejor para estas fiestas.

translation.en: ♪ It's a Tracksville Christmas ♪
♪ At the top of our wishlist ♪
♪ Is to have all of our friends And family here ♪
translation.es: es compartir con nuestros amigos y nuestra familia.

translation.en: ♪ It's the perfect time of year ♪ ♪ To spread that holiday cheer ♪
translation.es: Es la época perfecta para difundir alegría

translation.en: ♪ And show the ones you love How much you care ♪
-[chuckles] -♪ Let's make a Mega Mission ♪ ♪ To spread that holiday cheer ♪
translation.es: Hagamos una megamisión para difundir esa alegría navideña.

translation.en: ♪ Happy holidays from Tracksville ♪
♪ Mighty Express Wishing you the best ♪
translation.es: ¡Felices fiestas de Pista Férrea! ¡Mighty Express! Les deseamos lo mejor para estas fiestas.

translation.en: ♪ For the holidays this year ♪
translation.es: Les deseamos lo mejor para estas fiestas.

translation.en: ♪ Happy holidays from Tracksville ♪
♪ Mighty Express Wishing you the best ♪
translation.es: ¡Felices fiestas desde Pista Férrea! ¡Mighty Express! Les deseamos lo mejor para estas fiestas.

translation.en: ♪ For the holidays this year ♪
translation.es: Les deseamos lo mejor para estas fiestas.

translation.en: And that's a wrap on wrapping! [chuckles]
Ho, ho, ho! Jolly good work!
-[comms alert] -[Jubilee] Max!
Everything's set up for the party. How's it going at the North Pole?
translation.es: La fiesta está lista. ¿Cómo les fue allá?

translation.en: We finished making the presents. Now we just have to deliver them.
translation.es: Solo nos falta entregar los regalos.

translation.en: Great! See you soon! Over and out.
translation.es: Genial. Nos vemos. Cambio y fuera.

translation.en: [Santa] I don't like the look of those clouds.
translation.es: Esas nubes no se ven bien.

translation.en: Let's load up the sleigh so I can ho, ho, go before the storm hits.
translation.es: Carguemos el trineo para salir antes de que llegue la tormenta.

translation.en: That's all the presents! Checkity-check!
Let's hook up the reindeer!
Oh, no! The reindeer can't take off in this weather.
translation.es: ¡Ay, no! Los renos no pueden despegar con este tiempo.

translation.en: Does that mean no one will get Christmas presents this year?
translation.es: ¿O sea que nadie recibirá sus regalos?

translation.en: I'm afraid not, Brock. If the reindeer can't pull the sleigh then...
translation.es: Me temo que no, Brock. Si los renos no pueden tirar el trineo…

translation.en: I can do it!
Uh, I mean... we can do it!
We're made of metal and strong enough to get through all that ice and wind!
We might need even more help.
Calling all trains! Please report to the North Pole.
Let's haul, y'all!
Rescue Red to the rescue!
Penny, set, go!
This is so exciting!
Ho, ho, ho! Thanks for your help, everyone.
translation.es: ¡Jo, jo, jo! Gracias por su ayuda.

translation.en: OK, Nico, where to first?
Our first delivery is to Bat Cave Tunnel to deliver these hats.
translation.es: A la cueva Túnel Murciélago a entregar estos gorros.

translation.en: Then on, Red! On, Flicker! On, Penny!
translation.es: Pues vamos, Red, Flicker, Penny, Milo, Mandy, Brock,

translation.en: On, Milo! On, Mandy! On, Brock!
On, Nate! And on, Faye!
And away we go! Ho, ho, ho!
[Jubilee] Come in, Max.
It's almost time for the Christmas party to start. How's it going?
translation.es: Ya va a empezar la fiesta. ¿Cómo va todo?

translation.en: Well, we made it through the worst of the storm
but now we have to make the deliveries. And then we'll get there as fast as we can!
translation.es: Haremos las entregas e iremos cuanto antes.

translation.en: OK! See you soon! Over and out.
[Max] Bat Cave Tunnel straight ahead.
Let's ho, ho, go!
Merry Christmas, my bat friends! Ho, ho, ho, ho!
-Here you go! -Here you go!
-There you are! -Come and get 'em!
-[Liza] Here you go! -[Max] Here you are!
That'll keep 'em warm.
Now, let's deliver the rest of these presents.
Oh, no! The storm got even worse!
We're snowed in!
But we have to get these presents to the kids!
It's OK, Flap. There's gotta be another way out of here.
translation.es: Calma, Flap. Debe haber otra salida.

translation.en: [gasps] Look! Up there!
Yeah! But, uh, we'd have to fly!
[gasps] Excellent idea, Penny!
Um, Santa? According to my calculations, trains can't fly.
translation.es: ¿Santa? Según mis cálculos, los trenes no pueden volar.

translation.en: Let's see about that. Ho, ho, ho!
I can use the same magic that makes my reindeer fly.
translation.es: Puedo usar la magia que uso con mis renos.

translation.en: I'm not sure it'll work on trains, but I ho-ho-hope it does!
translation.es: No sé si funcionará en trenes, pero espero que sí.

translation.en: Who wants to try first?
-Me, me, me! -All right, Mandy.
Now, get ready to... fly!
Or not.
I'm flying?! Yippee!
All right! Ho, ho, ho! Who's next?!
[all] Me! Me! Me!
Where to now, Max?
Central Square Station!
Well, it's getting late.
I guess we'll just have to start the Christmas party without everyone.
No presents? It's the end of the world!
I hear trains! But where are they?
They're up! Wow!
-Ho! Ho! Ho! -Woo-hoo!
-All right! -Hooray!
This is a super-special, extra-important Christmas delivery!
translation.es: ¡Esta es una entrega de Navidad superimportante!

translation.en: [gasps] Santa?
Ho, ho, ho!
Santa!
Sorry we're late, Jubilee.
I'm just glad you made it! The Christmas party wouldn't have been the same without you.
translation.es: Pero llegaron. No hubiera sido lo mismo sin ustedes.

translation.en: Mighty Express saved Christmas!
Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas!
-Snow, snow, snow! -It's snowing!
♪ Happy holidays from Tracksville ♪
♪ Mighty Express Wishing you the best♪
translation.es: ¡Felices fiestas desde Pista Férrea! ¡Mighty Express! Les deseamos lo mejor para estas fiestas.

translation.en: ♪ For the holidays this year ♪
translation.es: Les deseamos lo mejor para estas fiestas.

translation.en: ♪ It's a Tracksville Christmas ♪
♪ At the top of our wishlist ♪
♪ Is to have all of our friends And family here ♪
translation.es: es compartir con nuestros amigos y nuestra familia.

translation.en: ♪ It's the perfect time of year ♪ ♪ To spread that holiday cheer ♪
translation.es: Es la época perfecta para difundir alegría

translation.en: ♪ To show the ones you love How much you care ♪
